title: Spiced naan
ingredients: ['250g strong white bread flour', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon instant yeast', '1 teaspoon honey', '175ml water', '1 1/2 tablespoons melted butter', 'Filling', '2 tablespoons butter', '1 onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon minced fresh root ginger', '2 teaspoons ground coriander', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 pinch chilli powder', '3 tablespoons raisins or sultanas', '4 tablespoons desiccated coconut', '2 tablespoons water']
